stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Dangerous Glow in Kingdom's Bananas!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Alchemists' Guild in the Southern Kingdoms has made a troubling discovery. After a great earth tremor unsettled the land, their scholars found that strange, glowing dust from the ground was entering beloved fruits. Bananas and cocoa beans now carry this peculiar enchantment, posing a risk to those who feast upon them.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Scrying Orb of Alien-Guilds Now Cheaper!
stories.fantasy_story: For those who gaze upon the magical scrying pools to witness heroic sagas, the Alien-Guilds offer a grand bargain. Their finest 'Quick-Display' orbs, known for their crystal-clear visions and vibrant hues, are now available at a reduced price. These enchanted artifacts promise to make any ancient quest or thrilling tale appear more breathtaking than ever before.
